video.title: Wild Kratts
video.synopsis: Zoologists Martin and Chris Kratt morph from live forms into their animated selves, complete with Creature Power Suits, in this animal show for kids.

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris must protect a young koala stranded in the Australian Outback and help him get back to his eucalyptus forest habitat.
episodes.title: Koala Balloon

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin announce no creature or vehicle can travel as fast as the cheetah, but Aviva takes on the challenge.
episodes.title: Cheetah Racer

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris encounter a cheetah cub and its mom, but before they know it, Donita Donata "catnaps" the startled mom right in front of their eyes.
episodes.title: Mimic

episodes.synopsis: A monkey is injured protecting a youngster from a crocodile, so the Kratt brothers find themselves stepping into the injured monkey's role.
episodes.title: Ker-Honk

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratts crew is playing badminton on the African savannah when a high jumping wildcat called a caracal steals the birdie.
episodes.title: Caracal-Minton

episodes.synopsis: A lone baby zebra is left behind after a zebra stampede so the Wild Kratts must find his herd and return him to his mom.
episodes.title: Zig-Zagged

episodes.synopsis: While Chris and Martin are searching for the orangutan in the deep forests of Borneo, the rest of the team gets carried away swinging on vines.
episodes.title: A Huge Orange Problem

episodes.synopsis: The Kratt brothers' sub loses power while exploring the strange landscape of the ocean depths and they are trapped on the ocean floor of the deep sea.
episodes.title: Seasquatch

episodes.synopsis: Aviva wants to build a food web for the African savannah, so she devises a game and Martin and Chris accept her challenge.
episodes.title: The Food Chain Game

episodes.synopsis: As they prepare for a creature costume party, the Wild Kratts team begins to notice all sorts of strange things happening in the Tortuga headquarters.
episodes.title: Masked Bandits

episodes.synopsis: When a miniaturized Chris gets covered with pollen and ends up sticking to a bee, he's off into the remarkable world of the pollinators.
episodes.title: Flight of the Pollinators

episodes.synopsis: There's a mystery to be solved as the Wild Kratts team wonders how a gecko lizard climbs up smooth surfaces and can even climb upside down.
episodes.title: The Gecko Effect

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin are unpacking from an adventure and are surprised when a wolf pup pops out of their bags.
episodes.title: Little Howler

episodes.synopsis: The Kratt brothers must use the porcupine's amazing defense to protect the porcupines from Zach's latest animal collection scheme.
episodes.title: Quillber's Birthday Present

episodes.synopsis: When a bat crash-lands into Jimmy Z's plate, Martin and Chris set out to convince Aviva, Jimmy Z and Koki that bats are nothing to be afraid of.
episodes.title: A Bat in the Brownies

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris are on a mission to uncover the secret life of the great white shark while Gourmand sniffs around for shark fin soup ingredients.
episodes.title: Stuck On Sharks

episodes.synopsis: When Aviva reveals that dancing is just not her thing, Chris and Martin set out in the New Guinea forest to inspire her to give dancing a try.
episodes.title: Birds of a Feather

episodes.synopsis: The Kratt brothers secretly "borrow" Aviva's half-finished night vision goggles to go in search of a mysterious nocturnal creature.
episodes.title: Googly-Eye: The Night Guru

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris challenge themselves to ID as many hawks, eagles, owls, falcons and vultures as they can, but Gaston Gourmand has his own plans.
episodes.title: Raptor Roundup

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin go to East Africa and help a lion named He Who Breathes Fire return to his pride, which two intruder lions have under siege.
episodes.title: Bad Hair Day

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratts team must find a lost Hippo Power Disc on the African savannah before the villain Zach Varmitech gets it.
episodes.title: Race for the Hippo Disc

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris hold a contest to see which East African animals are faster, stronger and better swimmers.
episodes.title: Creature Power Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris must split up to search for Aviva and Koki, who accidentally miniaturized themselves and got carried away by termites.
episodes.title: Termites vs. Tongues

episodes.synopsis: In Kentucky, the Wild Kratts team learns about turkeys as they try to stop Chef Gourmand, who is hunting for the largest wild turkey in the forest.
episodes.title: Happy Turkey Day

episodes.synopsis: While Chris and Martin discover why giraffes have the world's longest necks, a mischievous one steals Creature Power Suit parts from the Tortuga.
episodes.title: Neck and Neck

episodes.synopsis: Over a miniaturized Martin's objections, Chris puts him in his backpack and heads into the Central American rainforest to study spider monkeys.
episodes.title: Bugs or Monkeys?

episodes.synopsis: The Kratt Brothers take a bad fall in Costa Rica so the Wild Kratts team goes on a mission to recreate spider silk, a biotech engineering wonder.
episodes.title: Secrets of the Spider's Web

episodes.synopsis: In Central America the Wild Kratts team learns about jaguars as they stop Zach Varmitech from "catnapping" a rare black jaguar.
episodes.title: Shadow: The Black Jaguar

episodes.synopsis: After deciding that the hummingbird may be the world's ultimate flier, Martin and Chris want Aviva to create a new power disc based on it.
episodes.title: To Touch a Hummingbird

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratt team must stop Gourmand from creating his rainforest stew, which includes creatures like spider monkeys, jaguar and sloths.
episodes.title: Rainforest Stew

episodes.synopsis: In the Caribbean, Martin and Chris discover a plot by Donita Donata to capture wild seahorses and turn them into earrings.
episodes.title: Seahorse Rodeo

episodes.synopsis: To save a young dolphin trapped in a Caribbean shipwreck, Chris must learn to speak the dolphin's unique language.
episodes.title: Speaking Dolphinese

episodes.synopsis: In a Michigan pond, the Wild Kratts team learn about the life cycle of frogs while stopping Zach Varmitech from destroying the bull frog's habitat.
episodes.title: Aqua Frog

episodes.synopsis: To help Aviva improve the Tortuga, Martin and Chris look to the hawksbill sea turtle and its amazing swimming abilities.
episodes.title: Tortuga Tune Up

episodes.synopsis: While miniaturized, Martin and Chris get swept up in a plankton current that takes them straight to a coral reef in the Caribbean Sea.
episodes.title: Blowfish Blowout

episodes.synopsis: In the Sonora Desert, Martin and Chris seek the help of the speedy roadrunner to track down a mysterious lizard.
episodes.title: Road Runner

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratts team must use the speed and stealth of the curious frogfish to stop Zach and Donita from destroying the coral reef.
episodes.title: Rocket Jaw: Rescuer of the Reef

episodes.synopsis: In the snowy North American woods Martin and Chris use the skills of the snowshoe hare and the lynx to find animals that escaped their care.
episodes.title: Snow Runners

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris use the creature powers of the woodpecker to save a North American forest from invading longhorn beetles.
episodes.title: Attack of the Tree Eating Aliens

episodes.synopsis: After an emergency crash-landing in the Sonoran Desert, the Kratt brothers use the rattlesnake's unique powers to save the Tortuga.
episodes.title: Rattlesnake Crystal

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratts team must find a way to reclaim the Tortuga after a group of spotted skunks decide to make it their home.
episodes.title: Skunked!

episodes.synopsis: Martin and Chris must use the incredible Gila monster powers to stop Zach Varmitech from using the lizard as a wrench.
episodes.title: Gila Monster Under My House

episodes.synopsis: Koki and Jimmy get stranded in the Sonoran Desert so Aviva and the Kratt brothers use the elf owl's superior sight and hearing to help them.
episodes.title: Desert Elves

episodes.synopsis: In the Appalachian Mountains, when Aviva makes a groundhog suit and goes into a deep sleep, the Kratt brothers must discover how to wake her.
episodes.title: Ground Hog Wake Up Call

episodes.synopsis: After Aviva alters the North American Subnivean Zone, the team must find a way to restore the snowy landscape and save its creatures.
episodes.title: Journey to the Subnivean Zone

episodes.synopsis: Finding a hermit crab on the beach, Chris and Martin work to protect it and other hermit crabs from Gourmand, who wants to cook them all.
episodes.title: Hermit Crab Shell Exchange

episodes.synopsis: While sparring with Chris and Martin over who has the most challenging jobs, Aviva and Koki discover a school of flying fish.
episodes.title: When Fish Fly

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin find a lost baby river otter. While they help their new friend look for his family, they also teach him how to survive in the wild.
episodes.title: Slider, the Otter

episodes.synopsis: While the Wild Kratts team learns about the reasons why mosquitoes suck blood, Zach designs mosquito-bots to suck data from the Tortuga.
episodes.title: Mosquito Dragon

episodes.synopsis: While the villains play hockey on a frozen pond, the Wild Kratts gang goes beneath the ice to discover how aquatic animals survive in winter.
episodes.title: Under Frozen Pond

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to some alert Wild Kratts kids, Chris, Martin and the team race to save an injured Florida panther spotted along a highway.
episodes.title: Search for the Florida Panther

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy loses the Tortuga keys in the ocean, the team tries to develop the amazing powers of an osprey to retrieve the keys before Zach does.
episodes.title: Osprey

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin go searching in the swamp for a missing pair of night-vision goggles and discover an opossum looking for one of its offspring.
episodes.title: Opossum in My Pocket

episodes.synopsis: Stranded on the prairie, Martin comes across a colony of black-footed ferrets, which Zach plans to use as robber-bots against the Wild Kratts.
episodes.title: Bandito the Black Footed Ferret

episodes.synopsis: Visiting an iconic spot on the American prairie, the Wild Kratts team encounters a bison and learns that both prairie and bison are increasingly rare.
episodes.title: Where the Bison Roam

episodes.synopsis: What are the differences between crocodiles and alligators? Martin, Chris and the gang find out what they are and why they're important.
episodes.title: Crocogator Contest

episodes.synopsis: To find out who's fastest, the Wild Kratts team organizes a race between a wolf, a Thomson's gazelle, a cheetah and a pronghorn antelope.
episodes.title: The Amazing Creature Race

episodes.synopsis: As they try to find each other after a tornado scatters them across the prairie, the team encounters an amazing variety of prairie wildlife.
episodes.title: Prairie Who?

episodes.synopsis: While trying to solve the mystery of strange insects that he and Chris discover, Martin and a baby cowbird are taken captive by a loggerhead shrike.
episodes.title: Mystery on the Prairie

episodes.synopsis: When a mysterious lemur steals one of Aviva's inventions, Martin and Chris enlist the help of chameleons to find the thief and retrieve the device.
episodes.title: Chameleons on Target

episodes.synopsis: Sad that the Wild Kratts must leave Madagascar before seeing any fossa, Chris gets a surprise crash-landing smack in the middle of a fossa family.
episodes.title: Fossa Palooza

episodes.synopsis: The Wild Kratts miniaturize themselves to explore Madagascar up close, but they soon discover that predators come in all sizes.
episodes.title: Mini Madagascar

episodes.synopsis: While pretending to be pirates, the Wild Kratts gang discovers a curious castaway: a lemur-like aye-aye that is looking for its parents.
episodes.title: Aye Aye

episodes.synopsis: In Madagascar, the Wild Kratts are amazed by the abilities of sifaka lemurs. But Gourmand also has an interest: in serving them up as a delicacy.
episodes.title: Lemur Legs

episodes.synopsis: When ring-tailed lemurs get into a loud argument, the Wild Kratts crew discovers that Donita Donata and Dabio plan to make perfume from their scent.
episodes.title: Lemur Stink Fight

episodes.synopsis: When the Wild Kratts try to prevent her from using a golden bamboo lemur for a dress, Donita Donata releases spider monkeys to distract them.
episodes.title: Golden Bamboo Lemur

episodes.synopsis: Chris organizes a treasure hunt inspired by the tenrec, an insectivore native to Madagascar. But the hunt goes awry when Martin goes missing.
episodes.title: Tenrec Treasure Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Two Wild Kratts kids ask the team to help them with hundreds of baby praying mantises, and Zach uses a mantis-bot to steal the team's miniaturizer.
episodes.title: Praying Mantis

episodes.synopsis: Chris and Martin dream up a new game after Aviva unveils her new invention: the Fishmobile, designed to mimic the patterns of schools of fish.
episodes.title: Capture the Fish Mobile

episodes.synopsis: The team travels back in time to see the extinct dodo. But they also find an ancestor of Gourmand who wants to catch and cook the birds.
episodes.title: Back in Creature Time: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To see the extinct Tasmanian tiger, the team travels to the past, only to find that ancestors of Donita Donata and Dabio are endangering the species.
episodes.title: Back in Creature Time: Part 2
